alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:04PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Tuscaloosa, north central Bibb and southwestern Jefferson Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 504 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bull City to North Johns to North Bibb. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bessemer, Lake View, Brookwood, Coaling, Vance, Woodstock, West Blocton, North Johns, Tannehill Ironworks State Park, Bull City, Abernant, Lake Wildwood, Mercedes Benz Of Alabama, Bankhead Lock And Dam, North Bibb, Promenade Tannehill, East Brookwood, Bent Brook Golf Club, Green Pond and Caffee Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
